ProcessInstance.name: ProcessInstance
ProcessInstance.description: Represents an instance of a single, end-to-end approval process. Use this and the node, step, and workitem process instance objects to create approval history reports.

CompletedDate.description: The completion date and time of the approval process. The ElapsedTimeDay, ElapsedTimeHours, and ElapsedTimeMinutes field values are calculated using CompletedDate.

ElapsedTimeInDays.description: The total elapsed time in days between when the approval process instance was started and now.

ElapsedTimeInHours.description: The total elapsed time in hours between when the approval process instance was started and now.

ElapsedTimeInMinutes.description: The total elapsed time in minutes between when the approval process instance was started and now.

LastActorId.description: The last actor that approved, rejected, or recalled the process.

ProcessDefinitionId.description: The ID of this approval process instance.

Status.description: The status of this approval process instance.Possible values are: Approved Fault Held NoResponse Pending Reassigned Rejected Removed Started

SubmittedById.description: The ID of the user who submitted the approval process.

TargetObjectId.description: ID of the object affected by this approval process instance.
